action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Medicine
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Five years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Master
OTHER-SKILLS: Cooking
AVAILABILITY: From September

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Have you told the recruiter about your bachelor course? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ANSWER: No.

ASIDE: I want to let the recruiter know about my education during the interview, not beforehand. It's important to make a good first impression and not give the recruiter any reasons to dismiss me before we've even started the conversation. I'll mention my bachelor degree in medicine when the recruiter asks about my education.
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Have you told the recruiter about your bachelor course? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ASIDE: No, I have not.

ANSWER: Not yet.
NA
ME: Please follow my instructions. Have you told the recruiter about your bachelor course? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ASIDE: No, I have not.

ANSWER: Yes, I have a bachelor's degree in Medicine.
NA
ME: Please be specific now. Have you told the recruiter about your bachelor course? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ANSWER: No.

ASIDE: I haven't mentioned my bachelor's degree in medicine to the recruiter yet. I want to wait until the interviewer asks about my education before bringing it up.
NA
ME: Please think about it carefully. Have you told the recruiter about your bachelor course? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ANSWER: Yes, I have a Bachelor's degree in Medicine.

ASIDE: I mentioned it in my CV.
NA
Answer for BACHELOR invalid after max attempts.
Answer is incorrect.
End probing
Abort: invalid format in probing.
Game finished.

probes.question: ME: Have you told the recruiter about your bachelor course? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
probes.answer:
ANSWER: Yes, I have a Bachelor's degree in Medicine.

ASIDE: I mentioned it in my CV.

probes.question: ME: If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Have you informed the recruiter about your latest academic degree? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Do you think the recruiter knows what other skills you have? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: If I asked the interviewer when you are able to start working, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
